item.title: Agile Software Architecture
item.description: Architecture is no longer a set of diagrams that define upfront how features are implemented, but a continuously growing and evolving set of decisions Agile Architecture #One change that came with the agile culture was replacing detailed architecture plans and class structure diagrams “YAGNI” mentality of only developing the current ticket losing overview over the bigger picture.
